articles.content:
Aster Vranckx
Who?
Belgian outfit KV Mechelen's breakout starlet.
Where?
The Mirror report Manchester City are set to battle Liverpool in the race to sign the teenage talent. 
Both clubs have reportedly been keeping a close eye on 17-year-old midfielder.… [+2026 chars]

articles.author: Nick Loughlin
articles.title: Man United to sign Sunderland prospect - The Northern Echo
articles.description: Manchester United have an agreement in place to sign Sunderland teenager Joe Hugill.
articles.content:
Manchester United have an agreement in place to sign Sunderland teenager Joe Hugill.
The 16-year-old striker is set to join the United academy next season, should the move receive Premier League ratification, in a £250,000 deal.
Hugill, who has been playing… [+251 chars]

articles.author: Samit Sarkar
articles.title: PGA Tour 2K21 trailer teases new golf game - Polygon
articles.description: 2K Sports is returning to golf with PGA Tour 2K21, a continuation of HB Studios’ The Golf Club franchise. A teaser trailer released Wednesday promises a full reveal on May 14. No platforms or release date were announced.
articles.content: Could golf be going annual again?

articles.author: Alex Dicken
articles.title: What makes Mohamed Salah so special? Team-mates, rivals and managers lift lid on Liverpool superstar - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Mohamed Salah has scored 70 goals in his first 100 Premier League appearances for Liverpool
articles.content:
Mohamed Salah has been the Premier Leagues best player since he signed for Liverpool. 
He claimed the prestigious PFA Player of the Year award in his first season at Anfield, pipping Manchester Citys Kevin De Bruyne thanks to a stunning 32-goal haul in the P… [+5507 chars]

articles.description: EVERYONE has been talking about *those* Indycar Esports collisions between Pagenaud/Norris and Ferrucci/Askew. Should they have been taken more seriously, or...
articles.content:

articles.author: Miguel Delaney
articles.title: Premier League: Split between clubs threatening plans to restart the season - The Independent
articles.description: Sources at other top 14 clubs are getting increasingly frustrated with the bottom six and perceived ‘obstacles’ as talks over how and when to bring the season back continue
articles.content:
The latest Premier League meeting has been moved to Monday, as they seek to take in Sundays government announcements, amid a split in the competition that threatens Project Restart.
The bottom six clubs remain opposed to using neutral grounds because of how … [+2755 chars]

articles.author: Darren Wells
articles.title: Mikel Arteta warns Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang over forcing Arsenal transfer exit - Mirror Online
articles.description: Aubameyang is out of contract in 2021 and continues to delay penning a fresh deal amid transfer interest from Barcelona, Real Madrid and some of Arsenal's Premier League rivals
articles.content:
Mikel Arteta has fired a subtle warning to Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang that Arsenal will not pander to players who do not want to be at the club. 
The Gabonese striker is stalling over a new contract at Arsenal with little over a year remaining on his current … [+1755 chars]

articles.title: Ex-Rangers ace Kyle claims Celtic boss Lennon was impressed by him – but night out ruined his chances - The Scottish Sun
articles.content:
